name: Caniverse
description: Caniverse is a forward-looking blockchain ecosystem dedicated to delivering real-world solutions beyond speculation. Built on the foundation of technology, sustainability, and financial empowerment, Caniverse is redefining how blockchain is experienced — not just as a tool for trading, but as a platform for genuine utility and innovation. At its core, Caniverse is focused on creating a sustainable digital economy where individuals and institutions can interact, build, and grow through decentralized finance, tokenization, and blockchain-powered value systems. CNV – The Caniverse Token CNV serves as the primary utility token of the Caniverse ecosystem. It has been restructured and optimized with a total supply of 3 trillion to establish long-term scarcity, price stability, and organic value growth. CNV fuels every layer of the Caniverse ecosystem — from governance and staking to payments, liquidity incentives, and future integrations across DeFi and Web3 applications. This refined model ensures CNV maintains both functional utility and deflationary potential as the ecosystem expands globally.
